303172.text:
Changing masks heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Metamorphoses' ATK and different masks give different buffs. When changing masks, the buff of the previous mask will still last for 5s. When in combat, Borrow will be automatically triggered once.
Rage: Increases the ATK of all allies equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color> of Metamorphoses' ATK.
Joy: Increases the damage dealt by all allies by <color=#82C65D>$parameter3$%</color>.
Sorrow: Decreases the damage taken by all allies by <color=#82C65D>$parameter3$%</color>.

303175.text: Every 20 seconds, increases self ATK by 20% for 10s.
